Product Title: Dial Triple Refined Bar Soap, Fresh Cut Blossoms, 8 oz Lot of 4
Review Date: 2016/09/10
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '32.0 Fl Oz', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Body', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 4.4 x 3 inches; 2.15 Pounds'}
Review Text: I love this bar fresh cut blossom dial soap bar its the best of the best i have tried,..no dryness to my skin at all...its hard to find in any stores and the only stores that got it is at kaneohe Safeway, only had 1 bar left!!! No other stores has this, i dont understand stores, why do they sell something that DOESNT work!!?? and something that does work and works great, they dont sell it or they discontinue that awesome product!!??? owners, corporate and managements all are stupid!!!!!!
Review Title: I love this dial fresh cut blossom soap
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Color Care Moisture Shampoo by eSalon - Getting Rich
Review Date: 2018/12/31
Store: eSalon
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'eSalon', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated,Chemically Treated', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Softens,All Hair Types,Color-treated', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.1 x 2 inches; 10.41 Ounces'}
Review Text: love how gentle this moisture esalon shampoo and how easy to dispense the conditioner of moisture of esalon, my hair felt clean, and soft with no dryness towards my color treated hair, after blow drying my hair, it looked shinier and healthier, i bought this set of moisture care shampoo & the conditioner (2) from Esalon online, i definitely will rebuy...i love how beautiful my hair looks!!!
Review Title: i love this Esalon moisture care shampoo and also the moisture care conditioner
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Authentic Thai AR Vitamin E Cream 200 g
Review Date: 2021/05/02
Store: AR VITAMIN E
Product Description: ['Authentic Thai AR Vitamin E Cream 200 g, High Quality']
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AR VITAMIN E', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin e', 'Unit Count': '7 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4 x 4 x 4 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'body', 'UPC': '683332826939'}
Review Text: I love love this face and body cream, this is my first and only face and body cream i have tried and scent is like johnsons baby lotion scent, the cream is heavy , but you will NOT feel sticky and No oily afterfeel, (i promise!!), i use this on my face and entire body with no stickiness, i dearly love this cream and rebuy it again, my skin feels super soft!!!!
Review Title: I LOVE LOVE THIS "AR" CREAM MADE IN THAILAND
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lauat Herbal Hair Shampoo - 8.45 fl oz bottle of Lawat + Gugo + Virgin Coconut Oil Shampoo
Review Date: 2021/06/03
Product Description: ['The product line comes from the combination of three indigenous plant extracts: Lawat (Litsea glutinosa)Gugo (Entada phaseoloides), and Virgin Coconut Oil or VCO (Cocos nuciferas)  Sold in the market for 30 years, Lauat has reached the US, Germany, Italy and the Middle East since the break of the decade.', 'NOW AVAILABLE IN AMAZON', ', Lauat has never been more accessible.']
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Special Feature': 'Natural ingredients', 'Liquid Volume': '8.45 Fluid Ounces', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 1.38 x 6.97 inches; 8.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': '0V-H94U-IVEB'}
Review Text: I looooove this soooo much its great to keep my hair strong...i bought 3 and plan to buy more!!!!
Review Title: I love this lauat shampoo!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Salux Nylon Japanese Beauty Skin Bath Wash Cloth/towel (3) Blue Yellow and Pink
Review Date: 2021/07/03
Store: SALUX
Product Description: ['The product has been given as the following : Salux Nylon Japanese Beauty Skin Bath Wash Cloth/towel (3)blue Yellow and Pink']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Color': 'Pink,blue,yellow', 'Brand': 'SALUX', 'Towel form type': 'Washcloth', 'Age Range (Description)': 'All Ages', 'Material': 'Nylon', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '35 x 11 x 0.2 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'No. 100', 'UPC': '052104846275 885407884787 759894007533 755332034673 783327181699 887229609456 652054540607 887428756685 784922681171 737003560193 885217594296 687927010284 794437310879 742185060218 765829969319 033586349942', 'Manufacturer': '2scents'}
Review Text: i have been using this salux cloth since high school of the 70s and up to now!! i live in oahu hawaii and this is highly popular and all over the stores here in the islands, i dont like those body soap cloths, i dont feel clean, this salux body cloth is super excellent, some people say its rough, no its not, its getting use to it, now 2021, i cant live without it, i love the pink and purple wash nylon cloths of salux, my face and body feels super clean and super soft and younger looking!!! i even tried there Hard wash cloth, its not hard its that way due to the dryness of it, but once you wash it and add soap to your nylon cloth its soft!!!! you will like it!!! i do!!!
Review Title: i love this salux bath scrub cloth
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Hair Care**: Strong preference for gentle, effective shampoos and conditioners that enhance softness and shine. Frequent purchases indicate a desire for products that attribute moisture and care, particularly for color-treated hair.

- **Body Care**: Favors moisturizing body creams and soaps that prevent dryness, emphasizing the importance of non-greasy, gentle formulas. Shows loyalty towards products that leave skin feeling soft without stickiness.

- **Fragrance Sensitivity**: One purchase revealed a negative experience due to fragrance mismatches, suggesting a selective preference for pleasant and familiar scents, avoiding strong or artificial scents.

- **Product Availability**: Vocal about product accessibility; frustration noted when favorite items are not readily available in stores.

- **Long-term usage**: Loyalty to specific brands and products, indicative of established preferences and habits, especially for items that enhance cleanliness and comfort.

- **Quality over Price**: Positive responses to high-quality items, regardless of price, signify a willingness to invest in products that meet personal standards and efficacy. 

- **Cultural Products**: Interest in products from specific cultural backgrounds (e.g., Thai creams, Japanese bath cloths), reflecting an appreciation for traditional and natural beauty solutions.

target_interaction.title: Love how it keeps me dry
target_interaction.text: i loved how this Lume cream canister deodorant kept me dry, during summer, its great, but only issue is the scent of the rose or sweet lily deodorants, it has a stale musty scent to the deodorants, please improve the scent where the scent smells No musty, stale !!! other wise the holding power of the creamy deodorant is GREAT!!!
target_interaction.title_meta: Lume Solid Deodorant Stick - Whole Body Deodorant - Aluminum-Free, Baking Soda-Free, Hypoallergenic, Safe For Sensitive Skin - 2.6 Ounce Solid Stick (Warm Vanilla)
